title: Phase 5: Aura Remove Command
description: Implements aura remove CLI command for cleanup. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/feature-aura-remove.md

title: Test /aura.act end-to-end
description: Full pipeline test. Run /aura.act with audio - should transcribe, generate title, create .aura/output/ directory with README.md, and move audio.

title: Review README.md Future Work section
description: Check README.md for feature roadmap and Future Work section. When ready to add features, create specs/ directory and use /aura.epic or /aura.feature to plan.

title: Phase 1: SoX Recording Script
description: Record audio to WAV with immediate transcription. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/feature-sox-recording-script.md

title: Read CLAUDE.md for project context
description: Start here. CLAUDE.md explains aura's architecture, dogfooding workflow, and how to add commands/scripts.

title: Phase 1: Queue Directory Structure
description: Define subdirectory format and file organization. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/chore-queue-structure.md

title: Phase 2: Beads Integration
description: Ensure Beads is properly required and initialized. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/feature-beads-integration.md

title: Phase 3: Brain Note Format
description: Define brain-compatible structure and tagging for Cyborg. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/chore-brain-note-format.md

title: Phase 4: Tron Verification Test
description: Create end-to-end verification with documented instructions. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/chore-tron-verification.md

title: Phase 3: Slash Command Coherence
description: Complete all 12 slash commands with full workflows. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/feature-slash-commands.md

title: Phase 4: Implement Cross-Project Strategy
description: Test and validate recording across projects. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/chore-cross-project-impl.md

title: Refactor intent detection from Python script to inline LLM
description: Remove .aura/scripts/intent_detection.py and update /aura.process and /cyborg.process commands to use Claude's LLM for intent detection instead of subprocess calls. More accurate, faster, eliminates cross-project dependency. Update specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/chore-intent-detection.md to document LLM approach.

title: Run aura init in tests/tron
description: Verify distribution works. Run 'uv run aura init' in tests/tron/ to confirm templates copy correctly to target repos.

title: Phase 5: Agent Installation Test
description: Agent follows README instructions from clean state, proves they work. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/chore-agent-installation-test.md

title: Phase 1: Installation Cleanup
description: Standardize on single installation method, remove dead documentation. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/chore-installation-cleanup.md

title: Phase 0: Clean Slate Test
description: Reset environment completely, document current installation state. Spec: specs/epic-aura-cleanup/chore-clean-slate-test.md

title: Phase 2: Aura Process Command
description: Process queue memos, analyze intent, format as markdown. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/feature-aura-process.md

title: Phase 5: Update Init with New Features
description: Updates init logic to include new scripts and commands. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/chore-update-init.md

title: Test /aura.transcribe with audio file
description: Verify dogfooding works. Run /aura.transcribe with a test audio file to confirm scripts at .aura/scripts/ are functional. Requires OPENAI_API_KEY in .env.

title: Phase 2: Intent Detection Logic
description: Define how to detect web research, summaries, code examples, etc. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/chore-intent-detection.md

title: Update README with proper uv virtual environment setup instructions
Phase 4: Cross-Project Audio Strategy
description: Documents the self-contained script approach for cross-project recording. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/decision-cross-project-audio.md

title: Remove cyborg.process.md from aura's commands directory
description: Delete .claude/commands/cyborg.process.md from aura repo - it's incorrectly placed. Cyborg commands should only exist in ../cyborg/.claude/commands/, not in aura's template source. This file would be copied to all projects via aura init, which is wrong. Update epic specs to clarify cyborg commands belong in cyborg repo.

title: Phase 3: Cyborg Process Command
description: Convert memos to brain notes with tags. Spec: specs/epic-voice-memo-workflow/feature-cyborg-process.md
